GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v6.0.16
GSD.description:
remoteproc: qcom: q6v5: Fix potential null-ptr-deref in q6v5_wcss_init_mmio()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.16 by commit 3afa88ae9911b65702a3aca9d92ea23fe496e56f, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 0af65b9b915e52019aee91db3e1f8b39a7ec8d08. For more details please see the references link.
